name: part_006
file: tmp_【#ラプラス生誕祭2023】特別番組：らぷらすといっしょ！みんなかつもくせよ！【ラプラス・ダークネス⧸ホロライブ】 [MSIxNFblrCY]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_006.mov

scenes.description: Introduction to the drawing song game.
Amane Kanata's elephant drawing song performance.
Discussion of Kanata's drawing and transition to La+ Darknesss.
La+ Darknesss's 'Hip-Hop' version of the elephant drawing song.
Discussion of La+'s 'monster' drawing and transition to Shirakami Fubuki.
Shirakami Fubuki's elephant drawing song performance.
Everyone praises Fubuki's drawing, and they move to Kazama Iroha.

subtitles.original: はい！いってみましょう！
subtitles.english: Alright! Let's get to it!

subtitles.original: やっていきましょう！ミュージックスタート！
subtitles.english: Let's do this! Music, start!

subtitles.original: ひとつソーセージがあって
subtitles.english: There's one sausage,

subtitles.original: そこに……
subtitles.english: and there...

subtitles.original: ミミズ！ミミズ！ミミズ！
subtitles.english: Earthworms! Earthworms! Earthworms!

subtitles.original: うまれごとならほくろある
subtitles.english: if it's a birthday, there's a mole.

subtitles.original: お水がきれい
subtitles.english: The water is clear.

subtitles.original: お水がきれい
subtitles.english: The water is clear.

subtitles.original: そそしてソーセージから何か
subtitles.english: A-And then from the sausage, something...

subtitles.original: チーズの……あのチビソーセージの……
subtitles.english: cheese... that tiny sausage's...

subtitles.original: 草生えてる！
subtitles.english: Grass is growing!

subtitles.original: 食べ物じゃない！
subtitles.english: It's not food!

subtitles.original: 何か出てきて、これはゾウさんの……
subtitles.english: Something came out. This is the elephant's...

subtitles.original: ゾウさん！ゾウさんが生まれました
subtitles.english: Elephant! An elephant was born!

subtitles.original: しっぽもあるよ
subtitles.english: There's a tail too.

subtitles.original: わあ～！ゾウさん！
subtitles.english: Wow! An elephant!

subtitles.original: かなたん、絵描き歌はやったことあるかな？
subtitles.english: Kanata-chan, have you done a drawing song before?

subtitles.original: ある！ある！あるんだ！あるんだね！
subtitles.english: I have! I have! I really have!

subtitles.original: かなた下手！
subtitles.english: Kanata, you're terrible!

subtitles.original: すごい上手だったよ！
subtitles.english: It was very well done!

subtitles.original: あれだね、鼻から鼻水が出てるんだね
subtitles.english: I see. Snot is coming out of the trunk.

subtitles.original: そうだよ！お水が出てるんだよ！
subtitles.english: That's right! Water is coming out!

subtitles.original: そうなんや。かわいいね
subtitles.english: I see. It's cute.

subtitles.original: すごい！足どうなってんの？
subtitles.english: Amazing! What happened to the legs?

subtitles.original: 足変なの。足３本あるよ
subtitles.english: The legs are weird. There are only three.

subtitles.original: あともう一本どこいっちゃったのかな？
subtitles.english: Where did the other one go?

subtitles.original: 怖いよ！
subtitles.english: It's scary!

subtitles.original: かなたんよりうまくできるよって人いる？
subtitles.english: Is there anyone who can do better than Kanata-chan?

subtitles.original: はい！はい！はい！
subtitles.english: Me! Me! Me!

subtitles.original: じゃあ、やりあってたラプラスちゃんの見ていこうかな
subtitles.english: Then, let's see La-chan's, since she's so eager.

subtitles.original: 見ろよ見ろよ！吾輩の！
subtitles.english: Look! Look at mine!

subtitles.original: ラプラスちゃんのゾウさん、スタート！
subtitles.english: La-chan's elephant, start!

subtitles.original: エイ！エイ！ブン！エイ！
subtitles.english: Hey! Hey! Boom! Hey!

subtitles.original: エイ！手拍子！エイ！
subtitles.english: Hey! Clap along! Hey!

subtitles.original: 絶バイバイバイ！
subtitles.english: Des-bye-bye-bye!

subtitles.original: まる！
subtitles.english: Circle!

subtitles.original: 大きいチョウチョ！うわあ！
subtitles.english: A big butterfly! Whoa!

subtitles.original: さんかく！まるまる！
subtitles.english: Triangle! Circle-circle!

subtitles.original: あし、あし、あし、あし！
subtitles.english: Leg, leg, leg, leg!

subtitles.original: しっぽ！完成！
subtitles.english: Tail! Complete!

subtitles.original: いいでしょ？見てよ！
subtitles.english: Good, right? Look!

subtitles.original: 怖い！怖い！モンスター！
subtitles.english: Scary! Scary! Monster!

subtitles.original: 絵描き歌で足のところは「あしあしあしあし」って言うのね
subtitles.english: So for the legs in a drawing song, you say 'leg leg leg leg'.

subtitles.original: 斬新だったね、ラプラスちゃん。鼻と目のシワのディテールがポイント
subtitles.english: That was novel, La-chan. The detail of the wrinkles on the trunk and eyes is the point.

subtitles.original: ディテールとかいう言葉使わないで、子供が泣いてる
subtitles.english: Don't use words like 'detail'. Kids are crying.

subtitles.original: 下手くそさが本物。今のヒップホップなの？
subtitles.english: The badness is real. Was that hip-hop?

subtitles.original: ヒップホップだよ！ヒップホップ絵描き歌だよ
subtitles.english: It's hip-hop! A hip-hop drawing song!

subtitles.original: 最近の女性には早かったかな。ちょっとね
subtitles.english: I guess it was a bit ahead of its time for modern women.

subtitles.original: さっきのかなたんのほうがまだ絵描き歌っぽかったかな
subtitles.english: I guess Kanata-chan's earlier one was more like a drawing song.

subtitles.original: 見て見てこれ！「あしあしあしあし」がちょっと……
subtitles.english: Look, look at this! The 'leg leg leg leg' is a bit...

subtitles.original: びっくりしちゃったけど、鼻のディテールが怖い
subtitles.english: It surprised me, but the trunk detail is scary.

subtitles.original: 押すな！めっちゃ大きい。ディテールが怖い
subtitles.english: Don't push! It's so big. The detail is scary.

subtitles.original: すごい！お辞儀も入れて！
subtitles.english: Amazing! Put in a bow too!

subtitles.original: 次、私のほうが上手いよって人！
subtitles.english: Next, who thinks they're better?

subtitles.original: はい！はい！はい！
subtitles.english: Me! Me! Me!

subtitles.original: じゃあ、元気がいいフブキちゃんいってみようかな
subtitles.english: Then, let's go with the energetic Fubuki-chan.

subtitles.original: やる！一番上手く描けるよ！見てて！見てて！
subtitles.english: I'll do it! I'm the best at drawing! Watch! Watch!

subtitles.original: フブキちゃん早かったもんね、できたのもね
subtitles.english: Fubuki-chan was fast, finishing it quickly too.

subtitles.original: じゃあフブキちゃんのゾウさんの絵描き歌、ミュージックスタート！
subtitles.english: Then, Fubuki-chan's elephant drawing song. Music, start!

subtitles.original: なーや！やめろよ！角出て！
subtitles.english: Nayya! Stop it! The horns are out!

subtitles.original: やめて！大山がひとつ
subtitles.english: Stop it! One big mountain.

subtitles.original: 大山がひとつ、お花がふたつ
subtitles.english: One big mountain, two flowers.

subtitles.original: お鼻がにょろに、にょきにょきにょきにょき
subtitles.english: The trunk goes wiggle-wiggle, growing, growing...

subtitles.original: おしりからちょろり
subtitles.english: From the bottom, a little wiggle.

subtitles.original: ごまとふたつと、ちょんちょんちょんちょん……ゾウさん！
subtitles.english: Two sesame seeds and dots, dots, dots... Elephant!

subtitles.original: わあ～！ゾウさん！一番ゾウさんみたい！
subtitles.english: Wow! Elephant! It looks most like an elephant!

subtitles.original: 一番上手！ゾウさんみたい！上手！
subtitles.english: The best! It looks like an elephant! Great!

subtitles.original: かわいいでしょ！ゾウさんのバカかわいい
subtitles.english: Cute, right! The elephant is super cute.

subtitles.original: フブキちゃんのゾウさんはちゃんと耳が二つあるんだね
subtitles.english: Fubuki-chan's elephant has two ears properly.

subtitles.original: アピールしないで。君たちのターンは終わったよ
subtitles.english: Stop appealing. Your turn is over.

subtitles.original: ゾウさんだ。上手い、フブキちゃん
subtitles.english: It's an elephant. You're good, Fubuki-chan.

subtitles.original: ラスト、いろはちゃんやってみる？
subtitles.english: Last, Iroha-chan, want to try?

subtitles.original: わかりました！上手に描けてございます！
subtitles.english: Understood! I will draw it well!
